Projects

PhyloPic Website

PhyloPic is a website with freely reusable silhouette images of animals, plants, and other life forms, with phylogeny-based search functionality. A public RESTful API is provided.

  • Website
  • Contribution Website
  • Source Monorepo
  • API Documentation

Paleocene (Keesey Comics) Comic Book and Website

Paleocene is a comic book set shortly after the great extinction that ended the “Age of Reptiles”.
